item.title: 私人资产加速增长，贝莱德吸金 2,050 亿美元
item.description: 随着全球最大的基金管理公司贝莱德（BlackRock Inc.【原文：BlackRock Inc. pulled in $205 billion of client money in the third quarter as the world’s largest fund manager expanded its footprint in private credit and alternative assets.】

item.title: 特朗普的 "淹没区 "战略还包括大量清扫工作
item.description:
总统力图同时完成所有工作，这让民主党、法院、媒体和白宫不堪重负。【原文：

The president’s push to do everything at once has overwhelmed Democrats, the courts, the media—and the White House.

】

item.title: 据称意大利将寻求银行为预算出资 50 亿欧元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）领导的政府正在为其即将出台的预算法向贷款机构争取约 50 亿欧元（约合 58 亿美元）的贷款，并正在推动与银行就这一问题达成协议。【原文：Giorgia Meloni’s government is targeting around €5 billion ($5.8 billion) from lenders for its upcoming budget law and is pushing to reach an agreement with banks on the issue, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 华尔街警告 S&P 500 指数下跌买家未来将面临更多动荡
item.description: 华尔街策略师向受到周五美股大跌诱惑的买入者发出警告：未来可能会有更多的痛苦，即使中国和美国正表示对贸易谈判持开放态度。【原文：Wall Street strategists have a warning for dip buyers tempted by Friday’s rout in US stocks: There could be more pain ahead, even as China and the United States are signaling openness to trade talks.】

item.title: 贸易紧张局势有利于避险天堂，美元创八月以来新高
item.description: 在与中国的新贸易摩擦引发风险资产震荡并促使投资者寻找避风港之后，美元兑大多数主要货币走高。【原文：The dollar advanced against most major peers after fresh trade frictions with China rattled risk assets and sent investors looking for havens.】

item.title: 可可历史性涨势消退，巧克力需求仍在恶化
item.description: 全球可可工厂的生产放缓继续加深，这表明去年炙手可热的价格上涨对加工商利润的影响仍然挥之不去，甜食的成本不可能很快得到缓解。【原文：The slowdown at cocoa factories across the world is continuing to deepen, indicating that the impact of last year’s scorching price rally is still looming over processors’ profits and the cost of sweet treats isn’t likely to see a quick reprieve.】

item.title: ASML 创二十年来最佳月度业绩，成为瞩目焦点
item.description: ASML Holding NV 的股价在一个多月内上涨了 45%，原因是人们希望人工智能基础设施的加速建设将推动芯片设备订单的增加。【原文：ASML Holding NV faces a potentially tricky earnings test, after the stock rallied 45% in little over a month on hopes that the accelerating buildout in artificial intelligence infrastructure will drive chip equipment orders.】

item.title: 奢侈品股复苏曙光即将面临盈利考验
item.description: 近期奢侈品制造商股价的反弹将在这个财报季经受考验，因为估值已经回到了苛刻的水平。【原文：The recent rally in the shares of luxury goods makers will be put to the test this earnings season, as valuations are already back at demanding levels.】

item.title: 德国投资者信心因财政刺激希望而上升
item.description: 投资者对德国经济的乐观情绪在 9 月份有所改善，这反映了大规模财政刺激措施将使德国摆脱低迷的希望。【原文：Investor optimism in Germany’s economy improved in September, reflecting hopes that massive fiscal stimulus will pull the country out of its malaise.】

item.title: 赢得美国最富有购物者的信用卡争夺战内幕
item.description:
运通卡和大通银行之间的激烈争斗正在围绕更高的费用、奢华的活动和各种可以想象到的福利展开。【原文：

The fierce fight between Amex and Chase is playing out over higher fees, extravagant events and every perk imaginable.

】

item.title: 中国武汉将重建已关闭的本田工厂作为住宅区
item.description: 武汉计划拆除一家已停产的本田汽车公司工厂，并将土地改建为住宅用地，这凸显了中国中部城市在产能过剩拖累中国汽车产业之际，为闲置汽车工厂寻找新用途的努力。【原文：Wuhan plans to demolish a shuttered Honda Motor Co. factory and convert the land for housing, underscoring the central Chinese city’s push to find new uses for idle auto plants as overcapacity weighs on the country’s car industry.】

item.title: 安赛乐米塔尔 M&A 公司负责人在南非就出售业务举行会谈
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，安赛乐米塔尔（ArcelorMittal SA）的并购主管翁德拉-奥特拉多维克（Ondra Otradovec）正在南非与该国最高级别的发展金融机构和贸易部门就出售这家钢铁制造商在当地的子公司举行会谈。【原文：ArcelorMittal SA’s head of mergers and acquisitions, Ondra Otradovec, is holding talks in South Africa with the nation’s top development-finance institution and trade department about the sale of the steelmaker’s local unit, people familiar with the situation said.】

item.title: 美国银行民意调查显示，大多数投资者认为人工智能股票处于泡沫之中
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的一项调查显示，在今年的狂热上涨之后，全球有创纪录比例的基金经理表示人工智能股票正处于泡沫之中。【原文：A record share of global fund managers said artificial intelligence stocks are in a bubble following a torrid rally this year, according to a survey by Bank of America Corp.】

item.title: 荷兰收购耐克斯佩里亚公司后，中国对其实施出口管制
item.description: 芯片制造商Nexperia公司称，由于中国政府对荷兰政府接管该公司的管理权进行反击，该公司已被禁止向中国出口其生产的产品。【原文：Chipmaker Nexperia says it’s been banned from exporting products it makes in China as Beijing hits back at the Dutch government for taking over the management of the company.】

item.title: 杰富瑞认为 "第一品牌 "惨败将带来更多危险
item.description: 如果一家公司在周末发布声明，以支撑下滑的股价，那绝对不是什么好事。银行更是如此。杰富瑞金融集团公司（Jefferies Financial Group Inc.【原文：It’s never good when a company puts out a weekend statement to shore up a sliding share price. And that goes double when it’s a bank. This is where Jefferies Financial Group Inc. found itself on Sunday, addressing its entanglement with failing autoparts supplier First Brands Group.】

item.title: 泰国央行预计 2026 年通胀率将低于目标值
item.description: 泰国央行前行长在一封致财政部长的公开信中警告说，泰国的消费物价指数在2027年初之前都将保持在1%以下，单靠货币政策可能无法解决这一问题。【原文：Thailand’s consumer price index will stay below 1% until early 2027 and monetary policy alone may not be able to address the issue, the central bank’s former chief warned in an open letter to the finance minister.】

item.title: 黑山政客正在采用特朗普的策略挤压中央银行
item.description: 黑山正在从唐纳德-特朗普那里汲取如何对中央银行施以暴力的灵感。【原文：Montenegro is taking inspiration from Donald Trump on how to strong-arm a central bank.】

item.title: 为什么白银价格比黄金价格上涨得更快
item.description: 由于俄罗斯的乌克兰战争和美国特朗普政府非正统的经济政策，投资者和各国央行纷纷寻求避险资产，黄金在今年上演了戏剧性的反弹。但现在，白银正在成为焦点。【原文：Gold has staged a dramatic rally this year as Russia’s war in Ukraine and the US Trump administration’s unorthodox economic policies sent investors and central banks reaching for safe-haven assets. Right now, however, it’s silver that’s stealing the spotlight.】

item.title: 有报道称易捷航空可能被收购，易捷航空因此大涨
item.description: 据报道，地中海航运公司（Mediterranean Shipping Co.SA 正在考虑与一家投资公司一起竞购这家廉价航空公司。【原文：EasyJet Plc jumped the most in almost three years following a report that Mediterranean Shipping Co. SA is considering a bid for the budget airline alongside an investment firm.】

item.title: 国际能源署上调 2026 年石油供应过剩创纪录的预期
item.description: 国际能源机构表示，创纪录的石油供应过剩将比之前估计的更严重，过剩的石油已经开始在远洋油轮上堆积。【原文：A record oversupply of oil will be bigger than previously estimated and the excess is already starting to build up on ocean going tankers, the International Energy Agency said.】

item.title: 埃塞俄比亚与债券持有人未能就违约债务达成协议
item.description: 埃塞俄比亚政府与一笔 10 亿美元违约债券的持有者之间的谈判破裂，因为双方同意在未达成协议的情况下终止讨论。【原文：Talks between Ethiopia’s government and holders of a $1 billion defaulted bond collapsed after both sides agreed to terminate the discussions without an agreement.】

item.title: 新加坡企业承诺向马来西亚柔佛生态区投资 42 亿美元
item.description: 新加坡副总理甘金勇表示，自去年 1 月以来，新加坡公司已承诺在马来西亚柔佛州的联合经济特区投资 55 亿新元（42.3 亿美元）。【原文：Singapore companies have committed to invest S$5.5 billion ($4.23 billion) in a joint special economic zone in Malaysia’s Johor state since January last year, Singapore Deputy Prime Minister Gan Kim Yong said.】

item.title: 需求保持稳定，阿尔达尔（Aldar）从亚斯项目中获利 3.54 亿美元
item.description: 阿布扎比最大的房地产开发商阿尔达地产公司（Aldar Properties PJSC）在外国买家需求的推动下，通过出售其亚斯生活项目三座规划建筑中的房产，获得了 13 亿迪拉姆（3.54 亿美元）的收入。【原文：Aldar Properties PJSC, Abu Dhabi’s largest property developer, generated 1.3 billion dirhams ($354 million) from selling properties in three planned buildings at its Yas Living project, aided by demand from foreign buyers.】

item.title: 英镑逼近两个月低点，交易员增加英国央行鸽派押注
item.description: 在英国就业数据促使交易商加大对英国央行降息的押注后，英镑回落。【原文：The pound retreated after UK jobs data prompted traders to add to wagers on Bank of England interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 中美关税担忧再起，欧洲股市下跌
item.description: 由于中国威胁对美国遏制其航运业采取进一步报复措施，欧洲股市下跌。爱立信公司（Ericsson AB）飙升，因为这家瑞典电信设备制造商公布了强劲的盈利报告。【原文：European stocks fell as China has threatened further retaliatory measures against US curbs on its shipping sector. Ericsson AB soared after the Swedish telecom equipment maker reported robust earnings.】

item.title: 三星计划在重大薪酬改革中将奖金与股价挂钩
item.description: 三星电子公司首次根据股票价格向普通员工发放股票和奖金，这是为振兴韩国最大公司而进行的薪酬改革的最新一步。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co. is awarding shares and bonuses based on stock price to rank-and-file employees for the first time, the latest step in a compensation overhaul aimed at rejuvenating South Korea’s largest company.】

item.title: 马达加斯加总统躲藏起来，声称有人阴谋夺取他的生命
item.description: 马达加斯加总统因担心自己的生命安全而在数周的反政府示威后躲藏起来，他是最近一位面对青年领导的抗议者要求变革的统治者。【原文：Madagascar’s president is in hiding out of fear for his life following weeks of anti-government demonstrations, the latest ruler to face youth-led protesters demanding change.】

item.title: SEB 因涉嫌 EQT 股票销售内幕交易而被调查
item.description: 瑞典金融监管机构和公共检察官分别对贷款机构 SEB AB 进行了内幕交易调查，原因是该公司处理了 EQT AB 股票的大宗销售，即大宗交易。【原文：Sweden’s financial watchdog and public prosecutors have separately opened insider-trading investigations into lender SEB AB over its handling of major sales in EQT AB shares, known as block trades.】

item.title: 摩根大通称，如果没有风能和太阳能，美国有可能无法实现能源目标
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：The US will struggle to generate the energy it needs to power growth in its tech industry without including wind and solar, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s global head of sustainable solutions.】

item.title: 华为的电动汽车合作伙伴 Seres 被指正就 20 亿美元的上市计划进行意向评估
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国电动汽车制造商赛轮集团股份有限公司（Seres Group Co.【原文：Chinese electric-vehicle maker Seres Group Co. has started gauging investor interest for a Hong Kong listing that may raise $1.5 billion to $2 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】
